allowed_domains.description: A list of domains that are allowed to be scraped. If empty, all domains are allowed.
allowed_domains.title: Allowed Domains

include_link_html.description: Indicate whether to scrape the link and include the raw HTML of the link associated with this page in the 'link_html' field
include_link_html.title: Include Link HTML

include_link_text.description: Indicate whether to scrape the link and include the text of the link associated with this page in the 'link_text' field
include_link_text.title: Include Link Text

max_k.description: The max number of pages to return. If the number is set to 0, all pages will be returned. If the number is set to a positive integer, at most max k pages will be returned.
max_k.title: Max Number of Pages

target_url.description: The root URL to scrape. All links on this page will be scraped, and all links on those pages, and so on.
target_url.title: Query
